lines.text: People are weird.

[putting his cat out for the night]
I hope you run into a ten-foot mouse.
Did you ever figure out what this thing is supposed to be?
I think it's either a piece of fine art or a paperweight.
I don't even remember who gave it to us.
My sister gave it to us.
Oh. Well, then it must be a paperweight.
I guess we can't punish Victor for bringing Sparky back from the dead.

[with her back to Victor, who's sneaking appliances out of the kitchen]
Find what you wanted?
Yep.
Hope it wasn't cake.
Nope.

[after resurrecting his dog]
It's only Sparky.
What do you mean it's only Sparky?
Alright, the kid did it once and we can do it again!

[trying to resurrect Sparky by hooking him up to jumper cables to their cars, nothing happens]
Give it more juice!
Keep your dog out of my yard.
You know Sparky was hit by a car, we don't have a dog anymore.
Well I don't care if you got a new dog, keep him out of here.
We don't have a new dog!
